cmp: 包 (to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/to contract (to or for))
mng: to hold, to carry (in one's arms), to hug, to embrace, to surround, to cherish

exm.mng: to be sorry, to feel apologetic, sorry!
to hug, to cherish, within the bosom (of the family), to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)
to complain, to grumble, to harbor a complaint, to feel dissatisfied
bolster, a long pillow or cushion
